VIK1V.HE.summary: Viking Line ABP, together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger and cargo carrier services. The company offers its services using seven vessels between Finland, Sweden, and Estonia; and owns 13 buses. It also provides cargo shipment and freight forwarding services. The company also has operations in other Baltic countries, Poland, Denmark, Norway, and Russia. Viking Line ABP was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Mariehamn, Finland.
